title: Unable To Remove Sent Friend Requests
body:
I am trying to remove sent friend requests on the legacy client, and it just keeps telling me this

> You reached maximum friendship. If you want to add friends or receive more friend requests, you'll need to remove some contacts.

What do I do??

replies.body: It's strange that declining the requests isn't working out.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help individually with your specific issue.  We'll get back to you asap!
